title: Nine Inch Nails - And all that could have been ( DVD to MP3 )
description:
This is an audio rip from the Nine Inch Nails DVD "And all that could have been", including the hidden songs.

I did this because there's more songs on the DVD than on the CD version that is for sale. Since we've all started to use mp3 players, why should we be limited to albums of 74 to 80 minutes, right?

I used 0SEx (http://www.macupdate.com/info.php/id/9830) to rip the AC3 files from the DVD.

Then I used mAC3dec (http://sourceforge.net/projects/mac3dec) to convert the AC3's to MP3.

Method was based on the following guide:
http://hotpot.me.uk/hp/misc/DVD-to-MP3.html


Also, check out my Nine Inch Nails photos, that I took during the Lowlands festival in 2007:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/andra_veraart/tags/nineinchnails/
